Text: Hah! Haaaaa!

(I'm gonna train so hard today! Gonna be
strong like Boss man!)
Punch, and kick!
(My training partner today is a huge tree!)

(I'd ask Beta to be my partner, but she'd say she's
thousands of years old. She's like an old lady.)
With this, I can punch at full power! Haaa!
Stronger, stronger, stronger!!
Hah?
Ahh... I overdid it...
Again! After all the times I've told you!
Ha-ruff...sorry...

Again and again I have warned you. Don't break things
near the royal palace!
Okay...

For now, I'll spread a rumor that a large tree
was felled by lightning.

Thank you, that's helpful. It would be a problem if
we allowed a fuss to break out...

Why can't I just let it rip? If we can cover it up,
then I can just go nuts, right?

If the royal palace becomes an area prone to natural
disasters, it will draw attention. Don't you think it
might lead someone to this hideout?
Natural... I'm a natural?

Humph... Lady Alpha, she is totally unrepentant.
Or she just doesn't get it.

You're right... Delta, once again you're grounded for
the forseeable future.
Gaaaah! I don't wanna stay at home! I hate it!

Don't you think you're adding to our work? Stupid
dogs need to be kept on a leash.

And thus poor Delta is being kept on a leash at the
hideout for the mess she caused.

Ahh... I just wanna throw my body into something
active.

(Maybe I should run away from home like before...
Whoops, even that thought came back.)

(I really worried Lady Alpha and everyone else when
I did that. Now I know better.)
(It's not like everyone hates me and is bullying me...)

(But I think I get all worked up exactly because of
that! I wanna go wild... Wild...and crazy!)

Delta, when you want to go crazy, you really overflow
with energy.
Oh, Boss man!

I didn't even notice you, Boss man, and now you're
right here!

You've still got a ways to go if you can't even
notice me coming.

Gah... You've got a point. I can usually sniff
you out, Boss man.
I just realized I'm no good, so I'm on a downer...
Sounds serious. I spoke with Alpha.

L-Lady...Alpha? She talked to Boss man? Like, "Let's
get rid of that useless girl"?

Nope. She asked, "Isn't there somewhere where Delta can
go berserk?"
I don't wanna bother Boss man 'bout that...
There is such a place.
Huh?!

There's a cave near here. The rock is really hard,
so no matter how wild you go, you don't need to
worry about cave-ins.
Cave...in?
I mean that you can go all out.
Awoo! That'd be amazing!
Good, so you're up for it. Let's go there now, then.

I wish I had known sooner that such a great place was
nearby!

Haha, well that wouldn't have been possible. I only
just made it.
You just made it?
*cough, cough* N-Nevermind.

(Th-That was close. I almost let the cat out of the
bag without realizing it.)

(I went and dug it all out right after Alpha talked
to me about Delta.)

(I'd seen similar things in movies and anime, so I
reproduced it as the cave adventure "Shadow
Training Ground"!)
Right, let's go! To the Cave of Trials!
Awooo! Let's go!
